price: 59. Dhimashadayadii hore mooyaane? mana layna cadaabayo?
arabic: إِلَّا مَوۡتَتَنَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: illā mawtatanā al-ūlā wamā naḥnu bimuʿadhabīna
